column5: Today I was asked for permission to use a painting image on a clients website.  So I will give the answer to all my painting helpers.  If you OWN a painting or have contributed a reference photo towards a FINISHED painting, you may use THAT image on your website if you wish.  (As long as you aren't selling copies of the image.)  Thanks to all who have contributed and also the ones waiting for me to finish paintings.  Pam
